text: Ghana Gas Company is the state Agency that has the mandate to operate infrastructure required for the gathering, processing, transporting and marketing of natural gas resources in Ghana. ==History== The Company was incorporated in July 2011 by the Government of Ghana . ==See also== *Atuabo *Atuabo Gas Plant ==References== Category:Oil and gas companies of Ghana Category:Natural gas companies Category:Energy companies established in 2011 Category:Ghanaian companies established in 2011
title: Ghana National Gas Company
